item.title: UNkosibomvu
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book UNkosibomvu. Izindaba zebutho elidala elaliyinsila yenkosi uTshinga owaqanjwa igama lokuthi nguNkosibomvu. Zilandwa ngu - P. A Stuart. Abakhiphi bamabuku Shuter & Shooter booksellers and stationers Pietermaritzburg.]
